DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to determine the enrollment status using selected pre-treatment factor by which patients are segregated to assure equal balance of these factor before randomization to the intervention arms of a clinical protocol.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

PermissibleValues.value: Registering to study after induction systemic therapy
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Registration To Study Post Induction Systemic Therapy

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Registration To Study Post Induction Systemic Therapy
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of listing or recording officially; officially qualified or enrolled.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.: The act of bringing about something.: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.

The act of bringing about something.
